EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Lean+Leaders_Backers_2016.Reminder - Toronto - Day Before
EmailTemplate.subject: See You Tomorrow at the Leader’s Guide Workshop!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Leader’s Guide Workshop taking place tomorrow in Toronto.
The Leader’s Guide To Adopting Lean Startup at Scale Tuesday, July 26th, 2016 Registration @ 9:30am Sessions Start @ 10:00am Workshop Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/lean-workshops/backers/toronto]]> Lunch will be provided
Location Pivotal Toronto <[[http://pivotal.io/locations/toronto]]> 1 Toronto Street 11th Floor Toronto, Ontario M5C-2V6 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/1+Toronto+St,+Toronto,+ON+M5C,+Canada/@43.6499693,-79.3778347,17z/data=!4m13!1m7!3m6!1s0x89d4cb323c4430a5:0x1734827663017a61!2s1+Toronto+St,+Toronto,+ON+M5C,+Canada!3b1!8m2!3d43.6499654!4d-79.375646!3m4!1s0x89d4cb323c4430a5:0x1734827663017a61!8m2!3d43.6499654!4d-79.375646]]>
Questions? Contact us at leadersguide@pivotal.io <[[mailto:leadersguide@pivotal.io]]>
We look forward to seeing you there! The Pivotal Team
